summary: Peeved that dwemer scrap takes up too much room than it should? download this. :3
descriptionHtml:
So you've just looted Calcelm-- whatever his name is... his 'museum'... and you're puzzled(or just plain annoyed) to why the scrap metal is hogging your carry capacity value?[b] SO WAS I!

[/b]All this mod does is simple corrects the weight values of the smeltable scrap metals you find, it does ONLY that, doesn't make leather weightless or anything else weightless for that matter... just makes dwemer metal smelting more 'realistic'... well... smelting does have a tendency to 'burn off' impurities and the end result is lighter metal... but you'd be as annoyed as I would be if solid dwemer metal was to weigh anything above 5.

I care not for endorsements because I'm not an active modder... but hey, if you like the fact that this mod doesn't rename anything and add randomers names in the existing names of ingots and other crap just to make the mod developer 'popular'.. consider getting this mod known. <3
author: Debbi
